title: Update HTML title and restrict certificate download to completed players

requirements.text: Update the HTML document title in frontend/index.html so the <title> content is exactly "Barnabus, The Undeterred".

quotes: In index.html there is title element. Please update it's content to "Barnabus, The Undeterred".

acceptanceCriteria: After reload, the browser tab title displays "Barnabus, The Undeterred".

requirements.text: Remove the Wall of Fame testing behavior that allows downloading a certificate without completing the game: only render the "Download Your Certificate" button when the local completion flag indicates the player has completed the game (hasCompleted === true).

quotes: We're done testing the certificates, so you can now remove the functionality where I can download the certificate even if I haven't completed the game (don't show the button).

acceptanceCriteria: If hasCompleted is false, HallOfFameView does not render the "Download Your Certificate" button at all.
If hasCompleted is true, HallOfFameView renders the "Download Your Certificate" button.

requirements.text: When the certificate download button is shown (player has completed), generate the certificate using the completed player's Wall of Fame entry (playerEntry) rather than the last entry in the list; if no matching player entry is found, keep the button disabled.

quotes: remove the functionality where I can download the certificate even if I haven't completed the game (don't show the button).

acceptanceCriteria: When hasCompleted is true and the player’s entry exists in the fetched entries, clicking the button downloads a certificate for that player’s name.
When hasCompleted is true but no playerEntry is found, the button is rendered but disabled.

constraints: Do not edit any files under frontend/src/components/ui (Shadcn components are read-only).
Do not modify frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, or frontend/src/main.tsx (immutable paths).
nonGoals: Do not add or change backend (Motoko) APIs or persistence behavior as part of this request.
Do not address intermittent canister-stopped/service-unavailable errors beyond the existing Wall of Fame error UI.
